page.title: 16CARLOGIE HOTEL, CARNOUSTIE
page.content: The Carnoustie area is a good centre for{tourism,}having a long stretch of {sandy beach,}being near to several large towns and also being within easy reach of the{hills}and{glens}of{Angus. Carlogie House hotel is a large country house, about 100 years old which stands on high ground to the North of Carnoustie. It is a busy stopping-off place for{business-men and it also attracts quite a number of {foreign visitors,}mainly{Americans. The hotel has a function room which is frequently booked by local people for dances, parties etc. Behind the hotel can still be seen the buildings which housed the stables, the carriages and the chauffeur's cottage. The hotel stands in 11 acres of ground which has some fine old trees and well-kept gardens.
